resources.string: Take optimized pictures with the least amount of adjustment recognizing surrounding conditions automatically.
Take pictures of close objects clearly.
Take pictures by making light suit for indoor to get brighter pictures.
Take pictures of sky with richer colors that emphasize the red colors of sunset.
Take pictures brighter and clearer at night and in low light without flash.
Corrects facial imperfection automatically so that you can achieve bright and clear portraits.
Take portrait pictures against the backlight properly by adjusting exposure automatically.
Take portrait pictures brighter at night and in low light by adjusting exposure automatically.
Take pictures with Best face mode to select the best face when capturing group photos.
Take 5 consecutive pictures and select the best face for each person to get best possible image.
Take pictures remotely with connected other mobile phone by touching back to back.
Take high-resolution self portraits easily by touching the screen.
Take and merge pictures in various exposures to get pictures without too bright or dark areas.
Corrects facial blemishes automatically and take brighter pictures when taking portrait pictures.
Clearly capture text in white and black.
Capture text written on the blackboard clearly.
With pressed shutter button slowly move to left and right to take panoramic pictures.
Record videos of moving objects with the fast forward effect.
Take pictures or record videos adding funny effects on face in real time.
"Set the focus on an area you want by tapping the screen. Focus Lock : Set Focus Lock and exposure by Long pressing the screen. To remove lock, tap the preview screen."
"Take pictures after a delay. It can be set by dragging the capture button to the inside of the screen without choosing a time list in settings."
By dragging to the left of the screen the pictures can be seen.
Take pictures brighter and clearer automatically without flash in low light. This function does not apply to recording.
Set the save location of pictures. SD card can be set as default storage after it is inserted.

Turn on this function through Home>Settings and take pictures using voice recognition. To know specific commands, check the “Commands to control application” on Voice recognition settings or say “Help” on the preview.
Use a high ISO sensitivity when taking pictures in the dark. As the ISO sensitivity is increased, noise can make the image seem grainy.

"Select an appropriate metering mode for use in a variety of lighting condition. Wide : The Wide calculates the amount of light in multiple areas. Center : The Center calculates the amount of light in the center. Spot : The Spot mode calculates the amount of light in a designated area."
Record videos with sound. Turn off it to mute during recording videos.
Options in settings will be reset.
"When using data network, additional charges may be incurred by rate plan."
End camera while memory is in use.
Unable to use camera due to exceeded memory capacity.
Unable to use camera due to exceeded memory capacity.
Unable to operate camera. End camera.
Unable to operate camera. Please unlock and try again.
Unable to operate camera. Unsupported task.
Close the other camera application and try again.
End camera due to unrecognizable SD card.
The camera will be closed after 5 sec due to low battery. Recording file will be saved.
The camera will be closed due to low battery.
End camera due to exceeded size limitation.
Anti shake and photometry are only available in normal mode.
Anti shake is not available with front camera.
Can not recording during a call.
Current storage is unavailable. Save location changed automatically.
Not enough space on SD card. Save location changed automatically.
Not enough space on internal storage. Save location changed automatically
It is zoomed in maximum. it can be no longer zoomed in.
It is the default screen. it can be no longer zoomed out.
Change the resolution for Burst shot to 5M.
"Focus is locked. Tap the screen to set the exposure. For unlocking, please tap the focus lock icon."
"You can save photos and videos with the locations where they are taken. Turn on the Geotag option for it?"
It can be set by dragging the capture button to the inside of the screen without choosing a time list in timer option.
"Recording is unavailable. Please try again later."
The recorded video is too short to save.
Time Lapse Effect is also disabled.
Resolution is changed to apply effect.
Transmitted for recording until the maximum
For the prevention of temperature rise, the LCD brightness is adjusted.
For the prevention of temperature rise, the flash is turned off.
"As the device temperature rises, recording is stopped. Please use after the temperature is lowered."
"As the device temperature rises, cannot use the recording. Please use after the temperature is lowered."
"As the device temperature rises, cannot take a picture. Please use after the temperature is lowered."
"There is no saved img. Do you want to finish anyway?"
Can not edit captured pictures, orientation is changed.
Change the resolution for Best Face to 8M.
"There is no detected face. To make it recognize, take pictures staring into camera."
Make your best time by using Best Face
"Press the square to choose the other person"
"Press the small circle to change the face"
"Make your best time by using Best Face"
"Voice capture is available. Go, Ok, Capture, Take, Take picture, Take photo, Smile, Cheese, Say cheese, Shoot, 1-2-3, 3-2-1"
"Unable to connect network. Check the connection."
You can learn more commands in ‘setting > voice recognition screen’.
Unable to use the Voice recognizer during recording.
You can delete the pictures by sliding up and down
"NFC disabled. Enable NFC to connect Remote shot."
"Connected to Wi-Fi or HotSpot. Do you want to disconnect it and run Remocon?"
"To Connect, enable 'R&W/P2P’(NFC) setting on target smart phone, hold both phones back-to-back and touch this screen."
"Press 'back' button again to end connection and Camera."
Connecting is in progress. Please wait a second.
Timer is unavailable in Remote Shot mode.
"Switch to Camcorder, Remote Shot connecting will terminate. Do you want to disconnect?"
"Switch to Panorama, Remote Shot connecting will terminate. Do you want to disconnect?"
"Disconnect WiFi and reconnect WiFi-Direct for Remote Shot. Unable to search and connect to Wi-Fi AP while connecting WiFi-Direct."
Connecting with other smart phones, taking pictures remotely on Remote shot mode. Set Remote shot mode on Camera.
And enable NFC and R&W/P2P on target smart phone.
Then place two devices back to back for connection.
Tap the screen on Camera, the connection is started.
Then place two devices back to back for connection. Tap the screen on Camera, the connection is started.
*Using WiFi-Direct will not result in additional data charge.
*Needs Android Jelly Bean Higher, NFC embeded model.
Start the connection, VEGA Remote Shot app is run automatically on target phone.
If you have not been installed, jump to the download page for Play store.
Tap the shoot button on connected VEGA Remote Shot app, take photo through the camera lends
Set flash, resolution, focus, zoom and preview photos remotely.
If both phones are not connected firmly, please turn the Wi-Fi setting Off and on.
Do not change Wi-Fi setting while connected. May be disconnected.
If there is a big wall between the two smart phones, or the communication distance is too far then the Connection may be released.
When you terminate the application or change the mode, the connection is stopped.
mini Camera will be ended when launching other camera app.
While the camera is already running, mini Camera is unavailable.
While media is running, mini Camera is unavailable.
While Gaze recognition is running, mini Camera is unavailable.
Touch the screen to take a picture.
Take pictures and record videos with diverse shot modes.
It can be set by dragging the capture button to the inside of the screen easily.
Take pictures and record videos differently using filter effects.
Take pictures or record videos using the front and .-facing cameras at the same time after turning on the dual shot mode.
By dragging to the left of the screen review taken pictures on it.
